mapper.select: SELECT TaskType as taskTypeId, COUNT(*) AS typeCount FROM delegation_categories d left join task t on t.taskType = d.category_id WHERE STATUS = 'ONGOING' or STATUS = 'ACCEPTED' or STATUS = 'EXPIRED' AND d.IsEnable = 1 GROUP BY TaskType ORDER BY typeCount DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Task WHERE
STATUS = #{key} AND
DATE(StartTime) = CURDATE()

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Task WHERE (STATUS = 'ONGOING' or STATUS = 'ACCEPTED' or STATUS = 'EXPIRED' or STATUS = 'COMPLETED' or STATUS = 'INCOMPLETE' or STATUS = 'CANCELLED')
and OwnerId = #{id}

SELECT * FROM task 1=1
AND StartTime < #{now}
AND status = 'ONGOING'
ORDER BY StartTime DESC
